Jacksonville
-About-
Slide 1 of 2
Slide 2 of 2
hero gallery paused, press to play images slides
Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides
Welcome to O-Ku Jacksonville Beach, where modern Japanese cuisine meets beachside elegance. Our menu features sushi, sashimi, specialty rolls, starters, and enticing entrees inspired by traditional Japanese dishes. Enjoy waterfront and rooftop dining with stunning views. Experience our commitment to quality with fresh seafood and a selection of sake and Japanese whiskeys. Experience modern Japanese cuisine with a beach view at O-Ku Jacksonville Beach.
Reminiscent of traditional Japanese culture, O-Ku’s menu is comprised of signature starters, contemporary Japanese entrees, and seasonal traditional sushi that reflect the uniquely designed space. The beverage program is built around quality ingredients that celebrate Japanese culture and Jacksonville's best purveyors with a sophisticated blend of specialty cocktails along with premium sake, wine, and local beer selections.
Erik Hawkins
General Manager
Anne White
Pastry Director
Vonda Freeman
Wine Director
Kimball Brienza

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
ABOUT
O-Ku
O-Ku invites you to embark on a culinary journey where every dish tells a story and every moment is an exploration of flavor and culture.
Celebrating the best of authentic and innovative Japanese cuisine, O-Ku's restaurants are stylish and contemporary havens, offering a captivating fusion of tradition and modernity.
Established in 2013 by Founder Steve Palmer of The Indigo Road, O-Ku's concept continues to evolve, pushing the boundaries and redefining the culinary landscape.
Cuisine
O-Ku's menu showcases a variety of Japanese delights, ranging from sushi, sashimi, nigiri, and maki rolls to cooked entrees. Complementing these offerings are small plates like dumplings and robata skewers, alongside vegetarian and gluten-free options.
Ambiance
The restaurants boast modern and stylish atmospheres, characterized by sleek décor and comfortable seating. Some locations also feature inviting outdoor patios, adding to the dining experience.
Brand Visionaries
Masa Hamaya
O-Ku Executive Chef and Culinary Director
Kimball Brienza
Managing Partner
Steve Palmer
Founder
